website_summaries.verdict: Available in a variety of colors, this versatile travel toiletry bag lets you keep all of your toiletries, makeup, and cosmetics organized in handy, mesh pockets.
pros: Featuring multiple mesh and zippered pockets to store all of your necessities, this hanging cosmetic bag is perfect day-to-day use or traveling
Durable hanging hook for hands-free use
cons: Some have had trouble with the zipper

customer_reviews.title: Compact bag for shorter trips!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, small toiletry bag for shorter trips. The color is a nice, true pink. Bag seems sturdy and made of quality material. The bottom portion will fit two full size bottles (shown in picture), which I think is a nice added bonus. Love that this bag includes a hook. Picture with small travel size toiletry items for size reference.
customer_reviews.author: KLD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! The color was exactly what I was looking for and it has tons of space! It’s perfect for traveling and being able to hang it in the bathroom is super convenient. I love that it has two compartments so I can put the items that might leak (shampoo, etc) in the bottom so if they do leak it won’t ruin everything else in my bag. I also love the interior straps for holding things in place so it’s not just rolling around. I use essential oils and I can stick them under the straps and be good to go. Would totally recommend to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gardner

customer_reviews.title: A neat little toiletry bag, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag for my ever expanding make up collection, this fits *most* of it. Although I do have more than the average person. I absolutely love the color, I'm a huge blush pink, coral, rose gold junkie. There is extra little nice to haves in the design, including elastic straps to hold products in. I'm impressed by the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Annick Hart

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bag for my last two or three trips. It works well. My only complaint is that my bottles do not stand as well as I thought they would. That was my purpose in buying it. However, it does a good enough job so that my pump bottles and perfume bottles don't completely fall over or the pump gets pushed by mistake. The drawback is that because of the height of some of my bottles it does not zip that well.
customer_reviews.author: GLH125

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for travel - at home and abroad
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a toiletry bag in my opinion. It is big enough to hold my travel sized shampoo, soap, makeup etc, but small enough that it doesn't take up the whole suitcase. I feel like I can fit a lot in it and I like the little pockets and zippered areas to keep things separate. The outside is also kind of waterproof which is nice. I used this while travelling in England and Scotland for 10 days and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieR

customer_reviews.title: Bought two
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my trip to Paris and I loved it. We didn't have enough counter space and this was not an issue for me because I was able to hang it. When my sister come home from college she saw it packed and loved it so much that she took it. She used it for all her daily products because she loved the flexibility of just carrying this between her dorm and our house. Because of this, I purchased another one and I use it at home and when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: ...made very well...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is made very well, solid, good materials, craftsmanship. Also, has several pockets in in to help hold your items in place. I have not been on a trip to really use it yet. But, just getting it out and looking it over, I believe this is a great travel bag
customer_reviews.author: Roy Rains

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: It seems very well made and sturdy. Unfortunately the zippers have a tendency to "hang up" quite a bit around the corners. This bag is also too small to hold full size shampoo/body wash/hair spray, ect as the main compartment isn't tall enough because the bottom part of the bag is a separate compartment of it's own (and is included in the total measurement of the bag...)
customer_reviews.author: DrgnLady

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: even after reading the dimensions, just know that it does take up significant space in a suitcase/luggage. It is totally waterproof & I like the design, although the zipper does get stuck on the mesh & the hanging hook is pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Bach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this hanging toiletry bag. Pretty to look at, spacious enough to be efficient, and very convenient to use. It held everything in place standing up, and yet left room to place things laying down. The compartment underneath was especially convenient. I highly recommend this item. Mary O'Rourke-Brors
customer_reviews.author: MARY OROURKE-BRORS

customer_reviews.title: Great hospital bag, medication and makeup bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a hospital bad to carry my makeup on top and my medications on bottom! Worked great!! It’s cute and little enough to carry easily! I can’t lift over 5lbs so it’s great! I’m sure my makeup almost weighs that tho lol!
customer_reviews.author: abojo

customer_reviews.title: The zipper isn't as smooth as I'd like -- sometimes it gets stick in one spot but ...
customer_reviews.text: This toiletry bag has lots of pockets for organization and fits SO MUCH! It fits perfectly in the corner of one of the halves of my carry on luggage. The zipper isn't as smooth as I'd like -- sometimes it gets stick in one spot but you just have to align the sides carefully before pulling I recommend this bag to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for travel. It has 2 compartments so I can put shampoo and things that may leak in a separate space. Cute design, and bigger than the one I had been using...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Husband gave this to me as a birthday present and it’s great! The hook is a thick hard plastic and hope it doesn’t break. But other than that I totally love it! I hang it from a command hook on my bathroom closet door to leave room on the shelves and it’s an easy grab and go if I need to leave in a hurry and fits all my makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bag! Plenty of Room to store most travel-sized ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Bag! Plenty of Room to store most travel-sized items. Only thing I should've noticed is that the material is nylon which I missed. If you love nylon and could use a travel bag with lots of room for storage ... this Bag IS for you!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Head

customer_reviews.title: Cute Animal Print
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag, got this for my toddler. The only issue is with the top zipper it can get stuck sometimes so I just have to be careful when opening. But it fit everything in there that I needed. Plus the bottom was big enough for a good sized shampoo and lotion. You can fit a lot in it.
customer_reviews.author: OCShoeGal

customer_reviews.title: It has taken a good beating and still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than I thought it would be. Update: I have to update my review because even though this thing is smaller than expected, it fits a lot of travel size things. It has taken a good beating and still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Can’t use. Way to small!
customer_reviews.text: To small for an adult woman to use. Cute for a little girl. But I AM NOT A LITTLE GIRL.
customer_reviews.author: keenerbos

customer_reviews.title: Not my color
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller then hoped for. Also I ordered the peach one but got a blue one. I am not gonna return it because my mother likes it and I had no problem giving it to her for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: This bag is super cute. BUT the angle of the top compartment ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super cute. BUT the angle of the top compartment makes it very hard to zip up. It takes a lot of patience. Everything spills out while struggling to zip it up. Hence the 3 stars. It is smaller than I thought. It will hold what I use but if you have a lot of toiletries you might be disappointed. The pink color is adorable. And the fabric is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty colors tho
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I expected not much room for Shower and hair products But I will keep for a Makeup bag ! pretty colors tho !
customer_reviews.author: SReg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep your stuff organized
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my bathroom stuff! I originally bought it so my mom would have something for the products she keeps here- but now I’m thinking I might use it for traveling. It has great sized pouches and quite a few elastics to keep items in place!
customer_reviews.author: FamilyOf3

customer_reviews.title: Pretty. Useful. Cleanable
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Using as a make up bag. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mommyholic1013

customer_reviews.title: Plastic.  No monogram
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is a hanging bag it is plastic and not soft at all
customer_reviews.author: lemondrop

customer_reviews.title: I like to use this along side my transparent toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: Very likable travel bag, not very big, I like to use this along side my transparent toiletry bag , however this one in picture allow you to keep items private that you rather not be on display.
customer_reviews.author: Mommaliketoshop

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller in person. It does it’s purpose but ...
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller in person. It does it’s purpose but I was shocked how much smaller it is in person.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small...
customer_reviews.text: A bit small, but ok for travel if you don’t carry a lot of cosmetics you travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Teliantes from NH

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag it holds everything and is very compact
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag it holds everything and is very compact. I tend to take more stuff to ensure all situations are good for my family and this allows me the extra space for some first aid and mess in the bottom zip pocket. EVERYTHING I WAS LOOKING FOR :)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Haeckel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in pink🙂
customer_reviews.text: Able to hang on back of door because of the built in hook. Just the right size for travel or gym.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Riemer

customer_reviews.title: Very small. Not for adults.
customer_reviews.text: I sent mine back. It is child sized. Cant put much in it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra L. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and it will hold almost all of my numerous full size skincare bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: It's very good quality, just not big enough for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very good quality, just not big enough for me to use it as wanted. Only travel size items will fit in it. I'll use it for quick trips.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, exactly as advertised. It’s a cosmetic/toiletry bag, nothing overly complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda White

customer_reviews.title: Compact, yet plenty of room for everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: This toiletry bag is stylish, well-made, sturdy, and fit everything my daughter needed for camp.
customer_reviews.author: stonnic

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this makeup bag
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this makeup bag! I bought it to take on a trip with me. I was able to fit all my toiletry items and I still had plenty of room. The elastic straps were amazing and helped to hold everything in place while traveling. I would recommend this bag to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: on the small side
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I was expecting, but it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: So cute in pink!. And there is loads of room but the size is not bulky. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bag but very very small. Had a fit trying to return it. I won’t buy from this seller anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This hanging organization fits all of my stuff perfectly. I love that it has a lower compartment for liquids and it has straps on the insidethat will keep everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stockman

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas present and it is really high quality and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my sister for her Christmas present and it is really high quality and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite toiletry bag. It's so easy to pack and unpack and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Renita

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well made and keeps my makeup organized. The color is also a very nice shade of pink!
customer_reviews.author: Psych14

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than realized, and the zipper gets stuck on the curve.
customer_reviews.author: D Sanders

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect. I love the color and it fits what ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. I love the color and it fits what I need in it. Good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: MissCole7

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, zippers make it very difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The photo makes it look like a sturdy container, but it arrived all folded up. It would take a while to get the creases out of it and make it stand up straight. The zippers were very difficult to use. You have to completely zip the top closed to use the bottom portion. We just felt this was very inconvenient and we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: KPeterson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a little too small. When it is full the zipper function is very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it's adorable and has elastic bands for my makeup brushes
customer_reviews.author: Shelley_

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: love it, finally something that fits my needs when traveling :-)
customer_reviews.author: agnieszka kaminska

customer_reviews.title: Mm...there is not space enough...
customer_reviews.text: The item looks god but to small if you need full space. When you hang it results heavy and impractical the space on the bottom literally you can’t open without your things finish on the floor.. Interior is not deep enough for large items and is difficult to close if you have already complete the space on top... I don’t know not perfect for me..
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: It easy to hang for use in most hotels. If the towel rod are large you can’t hang the bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for travel. It hold quite a lot and fits nicely in my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte d gill

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once & it's already coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if the dumb zippers would zip
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if the dumb zippers would zip. Takes so much effort to try to zip around each corner,... pure frustration. Looks great, but that's not the purpose! I threw in the trash and found a different one whose zipper actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Paperroseies

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my make up bag. It’s a great size, not to bulkey so it doesn’t take up a lot of room. It’s cute and has a lot of zippers to keep makeup organized.
customer_reviews.author: anna white

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but zipper is a little difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but zipper is a little difficult to use. Maybe it will get better with use. I like the design of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty and does its job. Everything fit perfectly. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Illari

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Once it arrived, I was pleasantly surprised how beautiful it looked. It has definitely come in handy. This bag has helped me stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HANKCLES Designer Hanging Toiletry Bag, Travel Cosmetics, Waterproof, Nylon, Organizer for Travel Accessories for Men and Women
product_meta.description: Color:Animal WorldMake getting away for the weekend a bit easier with a travel cosmetics bag designed to fit your carryon and your busy life. Whether you're traveling for a short business trip or backpacking over the summer? Chances are you're going to need toiletries or makeup along the way. That's why we developed the HANKCLES hanging toiletry bag? A versatile makeup? Cosmetic and toiletries back that keeps your essentials close and hanging hands-free so you never have to leave shaving cream? Deodorant or foundation behind. Compact? Travel ready the perfect size for mom's or entire families? These cosmetics bags are crafted with waterproof nylon and contain tons of storage space to keep everything neatly secure. Sized to fit your carryon luggage? Backpack? Or even as a standalone bag? You never have to leave hygiene or personal items at home again. Product details? Multiple pockets and compartment? Strong? Long-lasting zipper? Folds for easy storage? Travel? Waterproof nylon? Toiletries? Cosmetic? Shaving? Five colors: Peach? Grass green? Navy blue? Animal world? Caribbean flaming? Size: 10.2 in x 5.1 in x 11 in.
feature_bullets: Travel & Vacation Ready – This versatile travel toiletry bag for solo business travel and family vacations lets you keep toiletries, makeup and cosmetics organized.
Handy Mesh Pockets – Every hanging toiletry bag for women and men comes with multiple mesh and zippered pockets to store creams, razors, soap, brushes and more.
Waterproof Nylon Fabric – Crafted with heavy-duty nylon, our makeup bag for women cleans up quickly and easily and resists splashing sink or shower water.
Hands-Free Hanging Hook – The top of each travel cosmetic bag is fitted with a durable hook that lets you attach it to a door or towel rack for hands-free use.
Beautiful Styles & Designs – Choose from a variety of colors with our toiletry and makeup travel bag, including Passion Peach, Honeydew Green, Beach Wave Blue Caribbean Flamingo or Animal World.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
